page.title: 03WALKINGTON,HOME LIFE PART 2.
page.content: WE KEEP PETS_DOGS,HAMSTERS,RABBITS, FISH AND CATS;WHEN WE GO ON HOLIDAY IN OUR TENT,CARAVAN,RENTED HOUSE OR HOTEL THE NEIGHBOURS LOOK AFTER THEM ALONG WITH OUR HOUSEPLANTS. OUTSIDE WE PLAY AT ROLLER_SKATING, SKIPPING,SWING_BALL,RIDING HORSES AND BICYCLES,BUT UPSTAIRS IN OUR BEDROOMS WE PLAY WITH LEGO,CARDS SNOOKER,TRAIN SETS,ELECTRIC RACING CARS AND READ LOTS OF BOOKS. OFTEN WE HAVE OUTINGS IN THE CAR, WHICH WE ALL HAVE,BUT WHEN WE ARE AT HOME AT WEEKENDS OUR DADS WASH THE CAR AND DO THE GARDEN WHILE MUM DOES THE HOUSEWORK,SHOPPING AND COOKING. WE OFTEN HAVE VISITORS,GO VISITING OR SLEEP AT EACH OTHERS HOUSES AND ON OUR BIRTHDAYS WE ALL HAVE A PARTY WITH OUR FRIENDS. THIS ACCOUNT IS THE COLLECTIVE VIEWS OF A CLASS OF EIGHT YEAR OLD PUPILS.
